title: (x) Stencil slab serif on "Caractère Libre" book cover - ncsbc (by Geoffroy Tobé) {Conor}
author: Captain Kidd

comments.content:
Impressive find, Conor.

Cpt Kidd: It is not customized Clarendon but [Century Schoolbook](http://web.archive.org/web/20130302094919/http:/www.identifont.com/show?6US).

Thats it, thanks, yeah some find Conor, ive been in touch with Geoffrey Tobe, lovely guy, he's still working on the font and it will be available to buy when he's finished.

Thanks again
That's a pretty charming stencil face.

Hey caption kid did it ever become available ?  
He won't respond to emails?

It's not quite what you're looking for, but Pochoir ( [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/yanone/pochoir/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130302094919/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/yanone/pochoir/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/yanone/pochoir/") ) and Bodoni Stencil ( [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/wiescherdesign/bodoni-classic-stencil/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130302094919/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/wiescherdesign/bodoni-classic-stencil/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/wiescherdesign/bodoni-classic-stencil/") ) might be tolerable sub-ins.
Thanks, Conor, for the ID. Thanks, mcplaid: Pochoir is beautiful, too.
